channel.title: Omfg! server wont run! help please!
channel.description: Ok I just installed Jdk 6 update 5 and restarted my computer. I went to go to run for my server and the cmd box just quickly flashes up then goes away again. I tried all my other sources. Same thing. And another weird thing is it still says I DON'T HAVE JDK AFTER I'VE DLED 10TIMES AND INSTALLED IT? I need help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 10:09:06 PM[/size][hr]Please someone help me?!?

item.title: Omfg! server wont run! help please!
item.dc:creator: @howi howi
item.description:
@howi wrote:

Nvm…

Here is my complier:

@echo off
Title Compiler
“E:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” *.java
java -Xmx1200m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
exit

I use E:\ cos thats were I installed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg! server wont run! help please!

item.description:
@Pure_Goddess wrote:

And what do you mean King? I read the environment variables. I’ve done chapter 7. Wtf you on about with complier?

Was I meant to download
JDK 6 update 5?
Cos I dled that one?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 10, 2008, 11:08:45 PM[/size][hr]I think I’ve got it working again.

Yea but I don’t know as I don’t HAVE Java.

Well, I guess on your own as I cant do anything about it But good luck anyways!

item.title: Omfg! server wont run! help please!
item.dc:creator: @kingjohn433 kingjohn433
item.description:
@kingjohn433 wrote:

No, You add that code to the compiler, (Right click on the compiler, hit edit, and delete the code. You then add the code above…)

That code’s to make it so that your compiler Knows to use Jdk6, Update 5…

~KJ

item.title: Omfg! server wont run! help please!
item.dc:creator: @kingjohn433 kingjohn433
item.description:
@kingjohn433 wrote:

refer to to God of Ikiliki’s guid to configureing your computer to JDK, (Chapter 7)
and when your done delete everything in your compiler, and add this…

@echo off
COLOR 08
cls
title Server Compiler
"%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

That should help

Read full topic
